summary: M\'eow is a new Khajiit follower who can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun
descriptionHtml:
He is just a random Khajiit follower. It\'s my first follower I created but I hope you\'ll have fun with him. He is good with both bow and sword and he can heal himself (however he is a essential character, so he can\'t really die) I\'m working on other follower mods, including one that would bring back a follower from TES IV Oblivion. (I\'m not telling who yet) + I will keep working om M\'eow and maybe even give him some friends :) 

Have fun :)
author: Peanut996
